FIELD.NAME: auto_drop
FIELD.COMMENT: Non-zero if the auto-enrollment process should unenroll students dropped from a PeopleSoft class.

FIELD.NAME: auto_withdraw
FIELD.COMMENT: Non-zero if the auto-enrollment process should unenroll students withdrawn from a PeopleSoft class.

FIELD.NAME: auto_group
FIELD.COMMENT: whether groups will be automatically created and updated based on associated PeopleSoft sections

FIELD.NAME: autogroup_option
FIELD.COMMENT: e.g. having "term" as part of auto-group name

KEY.NAME: courseid
KEY.COMMENT: courseid refers to id column in course table

TABLE.NAME: enrol_umnauto_classes
TABLE.COMMENT: Associates enrollment instances (probably one per course site) with PeopleSoft classes.

FIELD.NAME: enrolid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key to the enrol table.

FIELD.NAME: ppsftclassid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key to the ppsft_class table.

KEY.NAME: enrolid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key to the id column in the enrol table

KEY.NAME: ppsftclassid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key to the id column in the ppsft_classes table.

INDEX.NAME: enrol_ppsftclass
INDEX.COMMENT: Unique index on enrolid and ppsftclassid.
